data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Jhajjar.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhajjar, Haryana, India

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Jhajjar, Haryana, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Jhajjar, Haryana, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 534 believers in the county of Jhajjar.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jat Ghatwal (Hindu traditions) people.
Pour your Spirit out on the 48,500 citizens of Jhajjar, Haryana, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Jhajjar, Haryana, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jhajjar, Haryana, India has a population of 48,500.

We estimate Jhajjar has 534 people who might know Jesus, 588 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 47,378 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Jhajjar, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
